generated.css: *{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}body{background-color:bisque;font-family:Arial,sans-serif}.hero{background-color:#fff;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;padding:40px 0;min-height:360px}.hero__video{width:100%;max-width:1200px;height:550px;object-fit:cover;display:block;border-radius:12px;box-shadow:0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,.08);margin:0 auto;position:relative;z-index:1}.hero__content{position:absolute;z-index:2;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;width:100%;pointer-events:none}.hero__content .btn{pointer-events:all;margin-top:0;font-size:16px;padding:12px 28px;border-radius:8px}.btn{padding:8px 16px;border-radius:6px;border:none;cursor:pointer;font-weight:500;font-size:14px}.btn--green{background-color:#00b67a;color:#fff}.btn--green:hover{opacity:.9}.products{padding:20px;max-width:1100px;margin:0 auto}.products__grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(6,1fr);grid-template-rows:repeat(2,1fr);gap:6px}.product-card{background:#fff;border-radius:12px;overflow:hidden;position:relative;box-shadow:0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,.1);height:100%}.product-card__label{position:absolute;top:10px;left:10px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:2px;z-index:2}.product-card__label span{padding:4px 8px;border-radius:4px;font-size:12px;font-weight:500;color:#fff}.product-card__label span.day-product{background-color:#00b67a}.product-card__label span.discount{background-color:#ff4d6d}.product-card__label span.hit{background-color:#a64dff}.product-card__label span.sale{background-color:#ff4d6d}.product-card .btn-favorite{position:absolute;top:10px;right:10px;background:none;border:none;cursor:pointer;z-index:2;width:24px;height:24px}.product-card .btn-favorite svg{width:100%;height:100%;fill:#fff;stroke:#fff;stroke-width:2;transition:all .3s}.product-card .btn-favorite:hover svg{fill:#ff4d6d;stroke:#ff4d6d}.product-card:hover{transform:scale(1.02);box-shadow:0 4px 16px rgba(0,0,0,.2)}.product-card.div1{grid-column:span 2/span 2;grid-row:span 2/span 2}.product-card.div2,.product-card.div3{grid-column:span 2/span 2;grid-column-start:3}.product-card.div3{grid-row-start:2}.product-card.div4{grid-row:span 2/span 2;grid-column-start:5;grid-row-start:1}.product-card.div5{grid-row:span 2/span 2;grid-column-start:6;grid-row-start:1}.product-card__image{position:relative;width:100%;height:100%;min-height:150px;overflow:hidden}.product-card__image img{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;transition:transform .3s ease}.product-card__title-on-image{position:absolute;top:15px;left:15px;right:15px;color:#fff;font-size:18px;font-weight:600;text-shadow:0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,.25);z-index:3;margin:0;padding:0}.product-card.div1 h3{font-size:16px;font-weight:500;line-height:1.2;width:60%;padding:15px;color:#fff;z-index:2}.product-card__image:after{content:"";position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;width:100%;height:50%;background:linear-gradient(0deg,rgba(0,0,0,.7),transparent);z-index:1}.product-card__info{position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;width:100%;padding:15px;color:#fff;z-index:2}.product-card__info h3{margin-bottom:12px;font-size:16px;font-weight:500;line-height:1.2}.product-card__info span{padding:4px 8px;border-radius:4px;font-size:12px;font-weight:500;color:#fff;margin-bottom:4px;display:table}.product-card__info .discount{background-color:#ff4d6d}.product-card__info .day-product{background-color:#00b67a}.product-card__info .hit{background-color:#a64dff}.product-card__price{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center}.product-card__price span{font-size:18px;font-weight:600;color:#fff}.product-card__price .btn{padding:8px 16px;font-size:14px;border-radius:8px}.product-card.div4,.product-card.div5{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.product-card.div4 .product-card__info,.product-card.div5 .product-card__info{position:relative;background-color:#fff;padding:15px;color:#000;z-index:2;min-height:150px;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center}.product-card.div4 .product-card__info h3,.product-card.div4 .product-card__price span,.product-card.div5 .product-card__info h3,.product-card.div5 .product-card__price span{color:#000}@media (max-width:1200px){.products__grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(4,1fr);grid-template-rows:repeat(3,1fr);gap:8px}.product-card.div1{grid-column:span 2/span 2;grid-row:span 2/span 2}.product-card.div2{grid-column:span 2/span 2;grid-column-start:1;grid-row-start:3}.product-card.div3{grid-column:span 2/span 2;grid-column-start:3;grid-row-start:3}.product-card.div4{grid-row:span 2/span 2;grid-column-start:3;grid-row-start:1}.product-card.div5{grid-row:span 2/span 2;grid-column-start:4;grid-row-start:1}.product-card__image{min-height:250px}}@media (max-width:768px){.products__grid{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:15px}.product-card{width:100%;margin-bottom:10px}.product-card.div1,.product-card.div2,.product-card.div3,.product-card.div4,.product-card.div5{grid-column:auto;grid-row:auto}.product-card__image{min-height:180px}.product-card__title-on-image{font-size:16px}.product-card.div1{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.product-card.div1 .product-card__image{height:250px}.product-card.div4,.product-card.div5{width:100%;max-width:none}.product-card.div4 .product-card__info,.product-card.div5 .product-card__info{min-height:auto;padding:10px}.product-card__price{margin-top:10px}.product-card__price .btn{padding:6px 12px;font-size:12px}.hero__video{height:250px}}@media (max-width:480px){.products{padding:10px;overflow:hidden}.products__grid{display:flex;overflow-x:auto;scroll-snap-type:x mandatory;gap:10px;padding:10px;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch}.product-card{flex:0 0 85%;scroll-snap-align:start;transition:transform .3s ease}.product-card.div1,.product-card.div2,.product-card.div3,.product-card.div4,.product-card.div5{grid-column:auto;grid-row:auto}.product-card__image{min-height:160px;padding-bottom:66.67%}.product-card__info{padding:15px}.product-card__info h3{font-size:16px;font-weight:500;margin-bottom:12px;color:#000;line-height:1.2}.product-card__price span{color:#000}}.mobile-slider{display:none}.desktop-only{display:block}@media (max-width:768px){.mobile-slider{display:block;position:relative;width:100%;overflow:hidden;margin-bottom:15px;order:4}.desktop-only{display:none}.mobile-slider__container{display:flex;transition:transform .3s ease;width:100%}.mobile-slider__slide{flex:0 0 100%;width:100%}.mobile-slider__dots{display:flex;justify-content:center;margin-top:10px}.mobile-slider__dot{width:8px;height:8px;border-radius:50%;background-color:#ccc;margin:0 5px;cursor:pointer}.mobile-slider__dot.active{background-color:#00b67a}.products__grid{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.product-card.div1{order:1}.product-card.div4{order:2}.product-card.div5{order:3}.product-card{width:100%;margin-bottom:10px}.product-card__image{min-height:180px}}@media (max-width:480px){.product-card__image{min-height:160px}}.form-popup{display:none;position:fixed;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.5);z-index:1000}.form-popup.active{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.form-popup__content{background-color:#fff;padding:2rem;border-radius:4px;width:90%;max-width:500px;position:relative}.form-popup__close{position:absolute;top:1rem;right:1rem;cursor:pointer;background:none;border:none;font-size:1.5rem;color:#333}.form-popup__close:hover{color:#a64dff}.form-popup__form{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:1rem}.form-popup__field{position:relative}.form-popup__input{width:100%;padding:.5rem;border:1px solid #ccc;border-radius:4px}.form-popup__input.error{border-color:red}.form-popup__error{color:red;font-size:.8rem;display:none;margin-top:.25rem}.form-popup__error.active{display:block}@media (max-width:768px){.desktop-only{display:none}}.discount{background-color:red}.day-product,.discount{color:#fff;padding:.25rem .5rem;border-radius:4px}.day-product{background-color:#4caf50}.hit{background-color:orange;color:#fff;padding:.25rem .5rem;border-radius:4px}
